p.d: Alex and Sarah make the perfect couple. Young and good-looking, the happy parents of their young son Paul. The future belongs to them. Until tragedy strikes. One morning, Alex's body is found at the foot of a cliff. The investigation concludes that he committed suicide. Sarah is completely devastated, she doesn't understand. What could have pushed her husband to kill himself? Then she receives a love letter from a complete stranger, Ines, addressed to Alex... Directed by: Christophe Lamotte (France, 2018) Screenplay: Clothilde Jamin, Clélia Constantine Cast: Claire Keim (Sarah), Marie Bunel (Hélene Aguze), Samuel Jouy (Yann Kasik), Yann Trégouët (Matthieu Aguze), Anne Caillon (Nadine), Bastien Bouillon (Louis Aguze), Géraldine Martineau (Justine), Camille Aguilar (Lili Aguze), Gaspard Pasquet (Paul Aguze), Cyril Garnier (Alex Aguze), Lucienne Deschamps (Léonie), Loqman Menas (Jamel), Hocine Choutri (Xavier Dugeais) Genre: drama
